name: pdm-extension
description: Private Data Manager - Browser extension for Nillion's SecretVaults

scripts.build:dev: bun run clean && bun run compile:dev && bun run copy:assets
scripts.build:prod: bun run clean && bun run compile:prod && bun run copy:assets && bun run package
scripts.compile:dev: bun build src/background/background.ts --outdir dist --target browser --format esm --sourcemap && bun build src/content/content.ts --outdir dist --target browser --format esm --sourcemap && bun build src/popup/popup.tsx --outdir dist --target browser --format esm --sourcemap
scripts.compile:prod: bun build src/background/background.ts --outdir dist --target browser --format esm --minify && bun build src/content/content.ts --outdir dist --target browser --format esm --minify && bun build src/popup/popup.tsx --outdir dist --target browser --format esm --minify
scripts.copy:assets: cp manifest.json dist/ && cp popup.html dist/ && cp -r assets dist/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.lint: bun run lint:ts && bun run lint:format
scripts.serve: bun run build:dev && python3 -m http.server 8080 -d dist
scripts.validate: bun run type-check && bun run test && bun run lint
scripts.prepare: bun run validate && bun run build:prod
scripts.analyze:bundle: bun build src/popup/popup.tsx --outdir dist --target browser --format esm --analyze

author: PDM Team
